title: [Self-Directed] Mathematics Teaching Improvement Program Applying the UDL Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Teaching Methods and UDL Concepts
context.additional_context: Systematic training for pre-service and in-service teachers on applying Universal Design for Learning (UDL) principles to mathematics instruction

learning_goals: Participants can apply the three principles of UDL (engagement, representation, action/expression) to the design of mathematics instruction.
Participants can analyze UDL-based lesson scenarios in simulation/VR environments and propose improvements.
Participants can revise their own mathematics teaching materials to align with UDL standards and submit them as project outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
